game.name: Luxuriant
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Luxuriant is a fantasy card-driven roguelike deck-builder where you assemble and manage a deck of Royals, Citizens, Weapons, and Resources to outmaneuver Enemies in turn-based combat, earn Influence, progress through evolving levels, and unlock new cards for future runs.
